translation: Make your way toward Four's fortress.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Make your way toward Four's fortress.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Golem!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Golem!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Titan Lord!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Titan Lord!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: All men forward! Chaaaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: All men forward! Chaaaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Here she comes!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Here she comes!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Can we stop her?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Can we stop her?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: All of you, circle around her!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: All of you, circle around her!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: She's here! Back me up!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She's here! Back me up!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: It's the accursed Intoner! Run!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: It's the accursed Intoner! Run!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Aaaaaahhh! Heeeeeelp meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Aaaaaahhh! Heeeeeelp meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Yes! Over there! Kill her!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Yes! Over there! Kill her!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Eeeeee...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Eeeeee...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Coward! Fight or I'll kill you myself!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Coward! Fight or I'll kill you myself!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Let's go! Follow me!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Let's go! Follow me!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Backing you up, sir!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Backing you up, sir!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Jesus! Look at that flower!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Jesus! Look at that flower!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: She's a demon! A demon, I tell you!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: She's a demon! A demon, I tell you!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Get back! Get baaack!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Get back! Get baaack!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: No! Stay where you are!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: No! Stay where you are!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I value my life more than that!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: I value my life more than that!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Don't underestimate her! She's an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Don't underestimate her! She's an Intoner!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Why does she fight us!? I thought Intoners were supposed to protect mankind!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Why does she fight us!? I thought Intoners were supposed to protect mankind!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: 待て！　間合いをはかれ！{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}
source: 待て！　間合いをはかれ！{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}

translation: 手が足りないんだッ！　行くぞ！！{#Name="兵士Ｂ"}
source: 手が足りないんだッ！　行くぞ！！{#Name="兵士Ｂ"}

translation: Help! Someone, help me!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Help! Someone, help me!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Don't waste your breath, soldier!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Don't waste your breath, soldier!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Don't break formation! Stay on our back!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Don't break formation! Stay on our back!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Get over here!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Get over here!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: You damn monster!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: You damn monster!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We've got a casualty here!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: We've got a casualty here!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Aaarrrrggghhh...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Aaarrrrggghhh...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady Four must remain safe!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Four must remain safe!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I won't let that wench lay a finger on her!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I won't let that wench lay a finger on her!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Protect Lady Four with your lives!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Protect Lady Four with your lives!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Don't let Zero inside Lady Four's citadel!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Don't let Zero inside Lady Four's citadel!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: The citadel up ahead, eh?{LF}Thanks for the directions, chump.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The citadel up ahead, eh?{LF}Thanks for the directions, chump.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dammit! Kill that woman!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Dammit! Kill that woman!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Lady Four stays with us!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Four stays with us!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It's just Four, Four, Four all day{LF}with you idiots, isn't it?{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's just Four, Four, Four all day{LF}with you idiots, isn't it?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can't believe you fall for{LF}that cutesy act of hers.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can't believe you fall for{LF}that cutesy act of hers.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't you dare stain Lady Four{LF}with that rotten flower of yours!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Don't you dare stain Lady Four{LF}with that rotten flower of yours!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: If you're that infatuated with Four,{LF}I'll make sure you die together!{#Name="Zero"}
source: If you're that infatuated with Four,{LF}I'll make sure you die together!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dito! Lady Zero requires further support!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Dito! Lady Zero requires further support!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Not happening!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Not happening!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Unable to fully perform, eh?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Unable to fully perform, eh?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Sometimes old-timers have that{LF}problem with their man-bananas!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Sometimes old-timers have that{LF}problem with their man-bananas!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Gah! Shut up already!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Gah! Shut up already!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: If your man-banana's so tough,{LF}why don't you fight with it, huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: If your man-banana's so tough,{LF}why don't you fight with it, huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Unnnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Unnnnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: And you! Freakshow! Stop imagining it!{#Name="Dito"}
source: And you! Freakshow! Stop imagining it!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You know... Endurance is key to{LF}surviving a battle such as this.{#Name="Cent"}
source: You know... Endurance is key to{LF}surviving a battle such as this.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I, of course, will be fine, what{LF}with my perfect body and all...{#Name="Cent"}
source: I, of course, will be fine, what{LF}with my perfect body and all...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Not to mention my ravishing good looks!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Not to mention my ravishing good looks!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The hell do looks have to do with anything?{#Name="Dito"}
source: The hell do looks have to do with anything?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Anything? Looks have to do with EVERYTHING!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Anything? Looks have to do with EVERYTHING!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Don't blame me just because you're ugly as sin.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Don't blame me just because you're ugly as sin.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: What'd you say!?{#Name="Dito"}
source: What'd you say!?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Leave it, Dito! Concentrate on the battle!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Leave it, Dito! Concentrate on the battle!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I swear to everything that's holy,{LF}I will kill that man.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I swear to everything that's holy,{LF}I will kill that man.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Zero"}
source: *Huff, huff...*{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Are you all right, my lady? You appear fatigued.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Are you all right, my lady? You appear fatigued.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Forget about it. I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Forget about it. I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmm... I wager the magic within{LF}your flower is growing stronger.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Hmm... I wager the magic within{LF}your flower is growing stronger.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: If I had to guess, I'd say the{LF}blossom is absorbing your—{#Name="Octa"}
source: If I had to guess, I'd say the{LF}blossom is absorbing your—{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Let's go!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Let's go!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero does a good job of hiding it...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Zero does a good job of hiding it...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: But something is rotten with that flower of hers.{#Name="Octa"}
source: But something is rotten with that flower of hers.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: It's not rotten! It's as beautiful as the dawn!{#Name="Cent"}
source: It's not rotten! It's as beautiful as the dawn!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Ho ho! You misunderstand.{LF}I mean only that it is...suspicious.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho! You misunderstand.{LF}I mean only that it is...suspicious.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Perhaps there's more to it{LF}than meets the eye, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps there's more to it{LF}than meets the eye, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oooh! Riiight. Now I get it.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oooh! Riiight. Now I get it.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You do?{#Name="Octa"}
source: You do?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Ha ha ha! Of course!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Ha ha ha! Of course!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: She's worried her little accessory{LF}will go out of style!{#Name="Cent"}
source: She's worried her little accessory{LF}will go out of style!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Er...right. {#Name="Octa"}
source: Er...right. {#Name="Octa"}

translation: This journey is turning out to be{LF}more difficult than I'd expected.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: This journey is turning out to be{LF}more difficult than I'd expected.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Seriously? What exactly were you expecting?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Seriously? What exactly were you expecting?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You're traveling with ZERO!{LF}She's like a murder machine.{#Name="Dito"}
source: You're traveling with ZERO!{LF}She's like a murder machine.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I suppose it has been one massacre{LF}after another... Ungh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I suppose it has been one massacre{LF}after another... Ungh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Tucker down there, tiger.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Tucker down there, tiger.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: That was not a moan of pleasure!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: That was not a moan of pleasure!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: What will Lady Zero do once{LF}the Intoners are no more?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: What will Lady Zero do once{LF}the Intoners are no more?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: How would I know? And why would I care?{#Name="Dito"}
source: How would I know? And why would I care?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Right now, there's lots of killin' goin'{LF}on, and that's all I really need.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Right now, there's lots of killin' goin'{LF}on, and that's all I really need.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You shall not be forgiven, Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: You shall not be forgiven, Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: All that befell our poor Lady Four{LF}is your fault, demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: All that befell our poor Lady Four{LF}is your fault, demon!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I shall serve Lady Four, no matter{LF}what has become of her!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I shall serve Lady Four, no matter{LF}what has become of her!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Dammit! Our pure, unblemished Intoner is no more!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Dammit! Our pure, unblemished Intoner is no more!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Stay strong! It's up to us to save{LF}Lady Four from her lost ways!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Stay strong! It's up to us to save{LF}Lady Four from her lost ways!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Four's up ahead. Let's go.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Four's up ahead. Let's go.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Divergence: Branch D{#Name="127"}
source: Divergence: Branch D{#Name="127"}

translation: A single decision can change everything.{#Name="235"}
source: A single decision can change everything.{#Name="235"}

translation: So what do Zero's decisions mean for this world?{#Name="253"}
source: So what do Zero's decisions mean for this world?{#Name="253"}

translation: Will they bring about salvation? Or destruction?{#Name="127"}
source: Will they bring about salvation? Or destruction?{#Name="127"}

translation: There is one last branch to follow,{#Name="145"}
source: There is one last branch to follow,{#Name="145"}

translation: and it begins in the Land of Mountains.{#Name="145"}
source: and it begins in the Land of Mountains.{#Name="145"}
